comment: Will I get my order ? If you can't provide service , why do you run a business ! ! Its your company's reputation at stake . I am never going to buy anything again from Popxo .
amr:
# ::snt Will I get my order ? If you can't provide service , why do you run a business ! ! Its your company's reputation at stake . I am never going to buy anything again from Popxo .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / order-02
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (c / company
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Popxo"))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (r / run-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (b / business)
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown))
            :condition (p / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (p2 / provide-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (s / serve-01))))
      :snt3 (s2 / stake-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / reputation
                  :poss (c3 / company
                        :poss (y2 / you))))
      :snt4 (b2 / buy-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (a3 / anything)
            :ARG2 (c4 / company
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Popxo"))
            :time (e / ever)
            :mod (a4 / again)))

comment: Hey We are so sorry this happened . Please share your order ID & contact details . We'll get back to you ASAP . Appreciate your patience . Thanks
amr:
